p: DAVID Functional Annotation Bioinformatics Microarray Analysis can be accessed at https://david.ncifcrf.gov. The raw transcriptomic data of D0-D28 significant DEGs ( p < 0.05) included 2242 upregulated and 1438 downregulated terms, available in the supplemental material. Each list of Homo sapiens genes was independently analyzed by DAVID, to generate an analysis of associated gene ontology (GO) terms.
